  • Led a 22-member team divided into four squads, each focusing on different applications.
  •  Served as the technical lead for all units, collaborating with product owners, engineering leads, and stakeholders to refine epics and transformation tasks.
  • Engaged in high-level design discussions and contributed to the implementation approach, creating design documents alongside engineering leads and stakeholders.
  • Deputed to an onshore location in the UK, working closely with product owners, engineering leads, and solution architects.
  • Played a key role in various transformation activities and technology migration efforts

  • - Developed features and conducted unit testing with Java and Spring Boot. - Created and maintained Jenkins pipelines for builds.
  • Performed asynchronous processing using Spring JMS.
  •  Applied TDD methodologies for application development.
  •  Developed, shipped, and managed applications using Docker.
  • Monitored and resolved production issues within the agreed SLA with customers.
